name: Better Admin Bar
author: David Vongries

sections.description:
The WordPress Admin Bar reimagined. Replace the default WordPress admin bar and provide logged-in users the user experience they deserve.

Better Admin Bar allows you to quickly navigate to the key areas of your website like the theme customizer, your WordPress dashboard and edit the current page/post/custom post type.

üöÄ Features

  • Add an intuitive Quick Access Panel to your site
  • Hide Admin Bar for all users or specific user roles
  • Auto-hide the WordPress Admin Bar
  • Remove 32px top gap
  • Fix overflowing menu items in the Admin Bar
  • Hide Admin Bar from smaller screens
  • Change the opacity of the Admin Bar
  • Change the opacity of the Admin Bar (on hover)

For more features, check out Better Admin Bar PRO.

üèÜ Better Admin Bar PRO

Better Admin Bar PRO brings super-powers to your Quick Access Panel with features such as:

  • Custom Links
  • Page Builder Support
  • Limit User Role Access
  • Custom Post Type Support
  • Sign-Out Widget
  • WordPress Multisite Support
  • WooCommerce Support

Learn more about Better Admin Bar PRO

What’s next?

If you like Better Admin Bar, you will love our other, free WordPress products:

  • Page Builder Framework – A fast & minimalistic WordPress theme designed for the new WordPress era.
  • Ultimate Dashboard – The #1 WordPress plugin to customize your WordPress dashboard and admin area.
sections.installation:
1. Download the better-admin-bar.zip file to your computer.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Upload the swift-control folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the Plugins widget in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
4.1.1

  • Fixed: Adjust the animation in the quick access panel preview when items are reordered

4.1

  • New: Preview the quick access panel from within the WordPress backend to see all your changes in real-time

4.0.7

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.4

4.0.6

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.3

4.0.5

  • Tested up to WordPress 6.1

4.0.4

  • Fixed: Prefix icon picker handle to not interfere with BuddyBoss’ icon-picker.js

4.0.3

  • The Launch offer for Better Admin Bar PRO is about to expire. There are only a few coupons left! Get Better Admin Bar PRO at 50% off!
  • Tweak: Make admin notice match our branding

4.0.2

  • Minor tweaks & improvements

4.0.1

  • Fixed: Admin bar styling was applied when in customizer

4.0

  • New: Quick Access Panel
  • Tweak: Improved “Auto-Hide Admin Bar” setting
  • Tweak: Improved admin bar settings page
